sources.autograph: Berlin, Deutsche Staatsbibliothek, M.574. 'Quartetto IV°' (for title, see No. 201)
ms_copies_score: Leipzig, Musikbibliothek der Stadt, III.12.4, dated 1835
ms_copies_parts: Berlin, Deutsche Staatsbibliothek, M.577 and M.578. Two copies made in Berlin for Frederick William II
Marburg, Westdeutschbibliothek, Mus. MSS. 2005/8, signed 'F. W. Rust'
Prague, Národní Muzeum, XXII. B.59, 'Quartetto no. 39'
Rome, Accademia Santa Cecilia, G. MSS. 337 to 360, dated 1792
sources.first_edition: (c. 1782), Vienna, Artaria: Op. 33 no. 4 (for title, see No. 201)
later_editions: (c. 1782/1785), London, Kerpen: Op. 33 no. 4 (for title, see No. 201)
1785, Paris, Sieber: Op. 33 no. 4 (for title, see No. 201)
1798, Paris, Pleyel: Op. 39 no. 10 (Book 4 no. 1; for title, see No. 234)
arrangements: Of the second movement, as part of a quartet (no. 2) for flute, clarinet, horn and bassoon, by O. Van den Broek, c. 1810 (see No. 262)

partial_notes: Only 2 movements shown with incipits (numbers 2 and 3), movements 1 and 4 not visible on this page
